text:

[cultist]: Reveal another token. If you fail, place 1 doom on an asset you control.
[tablet]: -3. -5 instead if there is 2 or more damage on your location.
[elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, take 1 horror.

name: The Mad Trist
text:
Uses (4 secrets).

name: The Mad Trist
text:
